verbs.description: [ARG0: harvard emails] [V: illuminate] [ARG1: power of wealth] [ARGM-LOC: in admissions] a series of emails among top harvard university officials illustrates the role wealth can play in the admissions process the emails were revealed wednesday in a federal trial alleging that harvard intentionally discriminates against asian - american applicants in one email from 2014 a men tennis coach told the admissions dean that it would mean a great deal to admit a student whose family had donated 1 1 million to harvard official dean boston william fitzsimmons vice president al gore harvard harvard university
